Description_lang: The cold water causes molten Iron Constructs to rapidly solidify, rendering them unable to act. In addition, if they are dealt high damage during this state, they will shatter, dealing $62383s1 damage to all enemies in a $62383A1 yard radius.
AuraDescription_lang: Stunned.Chance to receive critical hits increased by $s2%.Shatters if dealt $w3 damage or more in a single attack.
